Moreover, if one wishes to cause rain from the heavens,

original: 觀虛空誦真言二十一遍。

recite the mantra twenty-one times,

Throw them into the fire, and they will immediately be delighted.

original: 又法加持菖蒲二十一遍口中含。
analyzed: 又法加持菖蒲二十一遍口中含。
translated: Moreover, if one consecrates calamus twenty-one times and holds it in the mouth,
one will be victorious in any debate with others.

and causes trouble and creates obstacles,
as soon as one recollects the mantra,
all of them will be dispelled.

original: 若常念誦不間注意於彼。
analyzed: 若常念誦不間注意於彼。
translated: If one always recites the mantra without interruption and focuses on them,

analyzed: 障者并親族眷屬皆自滅壞。

a belt, and armlets,
with two self-wrathful faces.

The practitioner should drink milk or eat barley.
Recite the mantra ten thousand times.

Moreover, beginning from the first day of the dark half of the month,

original: 對此像前每日三時誦真言。
analyzed: 對此像前每日三時誦真言。

using lotus flowers smeared with ghee, honey, and curds,

analyzed: 又法迦腩摩花搵酥蜜酪護摩。
translated: Also, take a flower of the same color as the object of the rite, anoint it with ghee, honey, and curds, and perform homa.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times.
Cast one into the fire for each recitation.

original: 一切有情皆得歡喜順伏。
analyzed: 一切有情皆得歡喜順伏。
translated: All sentient beings will become delighted and obedient.

enter the ocean-bound river and stand in the water up to the chest.

original: 取有蘂花誦真言一千八遍。
analyzed: 取有蘂花誦真言一千八遍。

recite the mantra 1,080 times for each session.

All people will respect one and one will become the head of a village.

original: 又法欲得摧伏設咄嚕者。
analyzed: 又法欲得摧伏設咄嚕者。

take human bone and make it into a stake.

analyzed: 加持一百八遍釘於心上。

Take a cloth from a charnel ground and wrap the stake.

original: 釘彼設咄嚕如前形頭上。
analyzed: 釘彼設咄嚕如前形頭上。

analyzed: 於三角爐中誦真言七千遍。

analyzed: 畫聖金剛童子像作忿怒形。

original: 於舍利塔前作先行法已。
analyzed: 於舍利塔前作先行法已。

Recite three times a day.

analyzed: 乃至合子中作佉吒佉吒聲。

take fragrant flowers and perform homa by throwing them into the fire.

analyzed: 又法若成就牛黃延壽法者。

translated: Take purple sandalwood and carve it into an open lotus flower.
In front of a stūpa or image of the Buddha, recite.

analyzed: 則得變為持明仙最為尊貴。
translated: Then you will be transformed into a vidyādhara immortal, the most venerable.

analyzed: 若所至持明仙所居住洞之處。
translated: Wherever the abode of the vidyādhara immortals is.

Either a boy or a girl,
Have them bathe and wear new clean clothes.

analyzed: 縛問過未來事皆悉得知。

translated: The reciter should have pure faith and respect for the Three Jewels.

The bhikṣu Haribhadra,

analyzed: 於此法中持誦得大効驗成就。

analyzed: 念誦現生則得一切成就。
translated: reciting in this lifetime, one will attain all accomplishments.

original: 又法設先持誦未有功効者。
analyzed: 又法設先持誦未有功効者。
translated: Moreover, if one has previously recited without any efficacy,

Furthermore, hold the corner of the kasaya with the left hand,

original: 加持二十一遍共人論議。
analyzed: 加持二十一遍共人論議。

analyzed: 又法經過賊境一心念誦。

original: 若欲解時心誦真言一遍即解。
analyzed: 若欲解時心誦真言一遍即解。
translated: If one wishes to release it, recite the mantra once in the mind and it will be released.

analyzed: 持種種香種種藥少分置於瓶中。
translated: Hold various fragrances and various medicines, and place a small portion in the vase.

original: 一一瓶誦真言加持一千八遍。
analyzed: 一一瓶誦真言加持一千八遍。
translated: Recite the mantra for each vase one thousand and eight times.
Until the eighth day of the dark fortnight in the fourth month.

original: 早朝烏未鳴時令男女沐浴。
analyzed: 早朝烏未鳴時令男女沐浴。
translated: In the early morning before the crows caw, have the men and women bathe.

original: 對本尊像前取屍林燒屍火及殘木。
analyzed: 對本尊像前取屍林燒屍火及殘木。
translated: In front of the deity's image, take the funeral pyre fire and remaining wood from burning a corpse in the cremation ground.
Take it back and offer incense and flowers in the homa.
Recite the mantra ten thousand times.
Recite the mantra once and throw it into the fire once.

original: 即得家中飲食無有窮盡。
analyzed: 即得家中飲食無有窮盡。
translated: Then you will obtain inexhaustible food and drink in the household.
You should widely give alms.
Moreover, if you are imprisoned and shackled,

original: 纔誦真言即得枷鎖解脫。
analyzed: 纔誦真言即得枷鎖解脫。
translated: as soon as you recite the mantra you will be freed from the shackles.

original: 又法於神通月對根本像前。
analyzed: 又法於神通月對根本像前。
translated: Moreover, in the month of spiritual powers, in front of the fundamental image,
drink milk and eat barley.
From the thirteenth to the fifteenth day,
for three days without interruption, recite the mantra.
The sage will then come.
The lamp flame increases, the earth moves, and the image moves.

original: 出聲告行者言汝今成就。
analyzed: 出聲告行者言汝今成就。
translated: It emits a sound and tells the practitioner, You are now accomplished.
After this, recite in front of the image.
All that is sought will be accomplished.
Furthermore, one should perform the preliminary practice.
Recite for six months.
Then, in front of a stūpa containing relics, set up the image.
Again, recite for another six months.
When the recitation is complete,
one will obtain five thousand gold coins.

original: 又法於有舍利塔前誦真言十萬遍。
analyzed: 又法於有舍利塔前誦真言十萬遍。
translated: Furthermore, in front of a stūpa containing relics, recite the mantra ten thousand times.
Even grave offenses that should lead to the evil realms
will all be eliminated.
Furthermore, before the crowing of the cock,

original: 取胡椒七顆加持二十一遍。
analyzed: 取胡椒七顆加持二十一遍。
translated: take seven grains of long pepper, empower them twenty-one times,
and eat them.

original: 即得聞持日誦一百五千偈。
analyzed: 即得聞持日誦一百五千偈。
translated: One will then be able to memorize and recite fifteen thousand verses a day.
Until the end of one's life, one will never forget.

original: 又法取毘梨勒木搵酥蜜酪。
analyzed: 又法取毘梨勒木搵酥蜜酪。
translated: Furthermore, take a piece of bilva wood, soak it in ghee, honey, and curd,

original: 對像前護摩。🔽誦真言十萬遍。
analyzed: 對像前護摩。 誦真言十萬遍。
translated: and perform homa in front of the image.🔽Recite the mantra ten thousand times.
When ten thousand recitations are complete,
in the middle of the night one will obtain one hundred gold coins.
Take half and offer it to the Three Jewels.
Moreover, the method for benefiting oneself and others is as follows:
Anoint a milk wood with ghee, honey, and curd.

original: 護摩三日日三時時一千八遍。
analyzed: 護摩三日日三時時一千八遍。
translated: Perform homa for three days, three times a day, with one thousand and eight recitations each time.
Recite the mantra.
Recite once and throw one [oblation] into the fire.

original: 所求榮官財產聰慧增壽悉皆獲得。
analyzed: 所求榮官財產聰慧增壽悉皆獲得。
translated: Whatever one seeks, such as promotion, wealth, wisdom, or longevity, will all be obtained.

original: 又法於恒河兩岸遠人間擣帛杵聲處。
analyzed: 又法於恒河兩岸遠人間擣帛杵聲處。
translated: Moreover, the method is as follows: At a place on both banks of the Ganges River far from human pounding and beating sounds,
Take soil to make a square altar seven cubits in size.
On the altar, draw a lotus flower with one thousand petals.

original: 於蓮華上以如來一磔手凡人一肘量取五種金金銀銅錫鐵相和。
analyzed: 於蓮華上以如來一磔手凡人一肘量取五種金金銀銅錫鐵相和。
translated: On the lotus flower, use the five kinds of gold, silver, copper, tin, and iron, each one cubit in size, to make a wheel.
Place it on the flower.
Use various flowers for offerings.
Around the altar, light seven butter lamps.
In the four directions, place four full vases filled with fragrant water.
In the vases, place a small amount of the seven treasures.
On top of the vases, place jujube fruits.

original: 應燒薰陸香沈香室利吠瑟吒迦香安息香。
analyzed: 應燒薰陸香沈香室利吠瑟吒迦香安息香。
translated: One should burn frankincense, agarwood, srivesataka incense, and olibanum.

original: 應施四方天食。🔽東方施粳米酪飯。
analyzed: 應施四方天食。 東方施粳米酪飯。
translated: One should offer food to the four directions.🔽In the east, offer rice mixed with curds.

original: 南方施水和粳米飯。🔽西方施粳米粆糖飯。
analyzed: 南方施水和粳米飯。 西方施粳米粆糖飯。
translated: In the south, offer rice mixed with water.🔽In the west, offer rice mixed with jaggery.
In the north, offer rice gruel with milk.

original: 對此壇前以波羅奢木然火。
analyzed: 對此壇前以波羅奢木然火。
translated: In front of this altar, light a fire with palasha wood.

original: 取牛膝草一千段搵酥護摩。
analyzed: 取牛膝草一千段搵酥護摩。
translated: Take one thousand pieces of kuśa grass, smear them with ghee, and perform homa.
First recite the mantra and empower it seven times.

original: 然後一遍一擲火中牛膝。
analyzed: 然後一遍一擲火中牛膝。
translated: Then, with each recitation, throw one piece of kuśa grass into the fire.
When finished, the wheel will emit light.

original: 手持此輪即得飛騰虛空。
analyzed: 手持此輪即得飛騰虛空。
translated: If one holds this wheel in one's hand, one will be able to fly through the sky.

original: 一切持明仙見皆悉順伏。
analyzed: 一切持明仙見皆悉順伏。
translated: All vidyādhara siddhas who see it will all submit and obey.
They will serve one as if one were a buddha.

original: 又法於白月十五日月蝕時行者受八戒。
analyzed: 又法於白月十五日月蝕時行者受八戒。
translated: Furthermore, the method is that on the fifteenth day of the bright fortnight when there is a lunar eclipse, the practitioner should observe the eight precepts.

original: 對舍利塔一日一夜不食。
analyzed: 對舍利塔一日一夜不食。
translated: In front of a stūpa containing relics, fast for one day and one night.

original: 取瞿摩夷未墮地者塗一圓壇。
analyzed: 取瞿摩夷未墮地者塗一圓壇。
translated: Take cow dung that has not yet fallen to the ground and smear it to form a circular altar.

original: 大小如一牛皮許取黃乳牛犢母子同色者。
analyzed: 大小如一牛皮許取黃乳牛犢母子同色者。
translated: The size should be like a cow hide. Take a yellow cow and calf of the same color.
Have a young girl milk the cow and churn the milk into yogurt and butter.

original: 取酥七兩置於金銀器中。
analyzed: 取酥七兩置於金銀器中。
translated: Take seven ounces of butter and place it in a gold or silver vessel.
Hold the butter with the left hand.

original: 以右手無名指攪酥誦真言。
analyzed: 以右手無名指攪酥誦真言。
translated: Stir the butter with the ring finger of the right hand while reciting the mantra.

original: 若暖飲之得聞持不忘日誦萬言。
analyzed: 若暖飲之得聞持不忘日誦萬言。
translated: If it becomes warm, drink it and you will attain the ability to remember and recite ten thousand words daily.

original: 一誦已後乃至終身更不廢忘。
analyzed: 一誦已後乃至終身更不廢忘。
translated: After reciting once, you will never forget it for the rest of your life.
If you obtain the sign of smoke,
all people who see you will love, respect, and honor you.
If the sign of light appears,

original: 則得安怛但那成就分酥供養及自食如前應知。
analyzed: 則得安怛但那成就分酥供養及自食如前應知。
translated: you will attain the accomplishment of anardhana. The butter offering and self-consumption should be known as before.
Furthermore, take silverweed for homa.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times.

original: 然後取灰置於四瓶中滿盛水。
analyzed: 然後取灰置於四瓶中滿盛水。
translated: Then take the ashes and place them in four full vases.
Empower each vase 1,080 times.

original: 所有患鬼魅癩癎被厭禱者。
analyzed: 所有患鬼魅癩癎被厭禱者。
translated: All those afflicted by ghosts, leprosy, epilepsy, and bewitchment,
First, have them bathe and put on new, clean clothes.
In a clean place, smear a circular altar.
Place a bed on top.
Have the patient sit.
Take the empowered water bottle.
The mantra reciter chants the mantra without interruption.
Sprinkle it on the head and body.

original: 所有病患災難並得除差。
analyzed: 所有病患災難並得除差。
translated: All illnesses and calamities will be cured.

original: 又法取無能勝花一千八枚護摩。
analyzed: 又法取無能勝花一千八枚護摩。
translated: Another method is to take one thousand and eight invincible flowers and perform homa.
Recite the mantra one thousand and eight times.
Throw one into the fire each time.
If you enter the battlefield, you will win every battle.
Another method is to have a young girl twist thread.
Recite the mantra and empower it.
Tie it to the left arm.
You will not be harmed by poisonous insects or poisonous substances.

original: 又法若於城邑聚落有疫病流行。
analyzed: 又法若於城邑聚落有疫病流行。
translated: Another method is that if there is an epidemic spreading in a city, town, or village,
in the middle of the night, smear a small altar.

original: 供養白食。🔽取乳木柴然火。
analyzed: 供養白食。 取乳木柴然火。
translated: Make offerings of white food.🔽Take milk wood and light a fire.
Take ghee and perform homa.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times.

original: 一誦一稱國王名投酥火中。
analyzed: 一誦一稱國王名投酥火中。
translated: Recite once and call the king's name, throwing clarified butter into the fire.
Plagues will be driven away from the kingdom.
Furthermore, if one wishes to subdue the Kumbhāṇḍa ghosts,
take a winter melon vine.
Cut it into 1,008 pieces, each 10 fingers long.
Anoint it with clarified butter and perform homa.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times.
Throw one piece into the fire with each recitation.
Those ghosts will then all be subdued.
Furthermore, if one wishes to subdue hungry ghosts,
take sesame powder and perform homa.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times.

original: 一遍以三指撮一擲火中。
analyzed: 一遍以三指撮一擲火中。
translated: With each recitation, take a pinch with three fingers and throw it into the fire.
They will then be subdued.
Furthermore, if one wishes to subdue the Piśāca ghosts,
take cloth from a charnel ground and perform homa.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times.
Throw a piece into the fire with each recitation.
They will then be subdued.
Furthermore, if one wishes to subdue the Yakṣas,

original: 取尼拘陀樹木長十指截搵酥蜜酪護摩。
analyzed: 取尼拘陀樹木長十指截搵酥蜜酪護摩。
translated: Take wood from a nyagrodha tree, ten fingers long, cut it, and soak it in ghee, honey, and curds, and perform homa.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times.
Recite once and throw it into the fire once.
You will then be able to subdue them.
Furthermore, if you wish to subdue the epilepsy ghost
Or the ghost that sucks people's vital energy,
Take black sheep's wool and perform homa.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times.
Take a handful and throw it into the fire.
The ghost will be subdued and the sick person will be cured.

original: 又法欲降伏摩醯首羅者。🔽取安息香作一千八丸。
analyzed: 又法欲降伏摩醯首羅者。 取安息香作一千八丸。
translated: Furthermore, if you wish to subdue Maheśvara,🔽Take 1,088 bezoars
And soak them in ghee and perform homa.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times.
Recite once and throw it into the fire once.

original: 一切摩醯首羅所有使者。
analyzed: 一切摩醯首羅所有使者。
translated: All the messengers of Maheśvara
Will all be subdued and driven to serve.
They will be able to accomplish all things.
Furthermore, take one liang of realgar

original: 若買隨彼索價稱口與錢。
analyzed: 若買隨彼索價稱口與錢。
translated: If you buy it, pay the price they ask and give them the money.

original: 用婆羅門皂莢木亦云蜜桐樹木柴然火。
analyzed: 用婆羅門皂莢木亦云蜜桐樹木柴然火。
translated: Use bhikṣu soapberry wood (also called honey locust tree wood) for the firewood to make the fire.
Burn realgar until it turns the color of fire.
Then collect it and place it in a mature copper vessel.
Pour ghee over the realgar.

original: 其酥取黃牛母子同色者。
analyzed: 其酥取黃牛母子同色者。
translated: For the ghee, use that from a yellow cow and her calf of the same color.
Have a young girl milk the cow, curdle the milk, and churn the curds to obtain the ghee.

original: 取酥蜜酪各別盛器中供養本尊。
analyzed: 取酥蜜酪各別盛器中供養本尊。
translated: Take the ghee, honey, and curds and separately place them in vessels to make offerings to the deity.

original: 收取雄黃盛於熟銅合子中。
analyzed: 收取雄黃盛於熟銅合子中。
translated: Collect the realgar and store it in a mature copper container.
Wait for a lunar eclipse.

original: 從十三日至十五日三日斷食。
analyzed: 從十三日至十五日三日斷食。
translated: From the thirteenth to the fifteenth day, fast for three days.
Facing north in front of a stūpa containing relics,
take seven bodhi leaves.

original: 四枚敷合下三枚覆合上。
analyzed: 四枚敷合下三枚覆合上。
translated: Spread four leaves on the bottom of the container and cover the container with three leaves on top.
Recite continuously without interruption.
If the sign of warmth appears, take it and apply it to the forehead.

original: 一切人見悉皆歡喜。🔽若煙相現則安怛但那成就。
analyzed: 一切人見悉皆歡喜。 若煙相現則安怛但那成就。
translated: Everyone who sees you will be delighted.🔽If the sign of smoke appears, you will accomplish the aṭarata.
If the sign of light appears, you will fly through the sky.

original: 如是依前法求成就雌黃牛黃安膳那法。
analyzed: 如是依前法求成就雌黃牛黃安膳那法。
translated: In this way, relying on the previous methods, one can accomplish realgar, ox bezoar, and aśvagandhā.
All are accomplished.
Only the method of ox bezoar is slightly different from this.
The method of ox bezoar takes the fifteenth day of the bright half of the month.
Wrap the ox bezoar in lotus leaves.
Place it in the two hands joined in añjali.
Uninterruptedly recite and empower.

original: 乃至三相現所獲果報如前。
analyzed: 乃至三相現所獲果報如前。
translated: Until the three signs appear, the fruits obtained are as before.
Another method is to make a lotus flower with the five metals.

original: 取欝金香牛黃龍惱香研作末。
analyzed: 取欝金香牛黃龍惱香研作末。
translated: Take saffron, ox bezoar, and dragon's delight incense, grind them into powder.
Take rainwater to mix into seven pills.

original: 置於舍利塔前安像念誦。
analyzed: 置於舍利塔前安像念誦。
translated: Place them in front of a stūpa containing relics, set up an image and recite.
Press the medicine with the right hand until it emits light.

original: 則飛騰虛空為持明仙壽命一萬歲。
analyzed: 則飛騰虛空為持明仙壽命一萬歲。
translated: Then one will fly up into the sky and become a vidyādhara immortal with a lifespan of ten thousand years.

original: 若以真言加持頭冠臂釧瓔珞腰絛。
analyzed: 若以真言加持頭冠臂釧瓔珞腰絛。
translated: If one empowers a headdress, armlet, necklace, or waistband with the mantra,
all will be accomplished as before.

original: 又法於有舍利塔前安本尊像。
analyzed: 又法於有舍利塔前安本尊像。
translated: Another method is in front of a stūpa containing relics, set up the deity's image.
If a layperson should receive the eight precepts,
they should make extensive offerings in front of the image.
Use acacia wood to light the fire.
Take khādira wood ten fingers long.
Smear both ends with ghee.

original: 從白月十四日起手護摩。
analyzed: 從白月十四日起手護摩。
translated: Start the homa on the fourteenth day of the bright fortnight.

original: 至十五日每日用佉陀羅木一千八段。
analyzed: 至十五日每日用佉陀羅木一千八段。
translated: Until the fifteenth day, use one thousand and eight pieces of khādira wood each day.
Recite the mantra one thousand and eight times.
Throw one piece into the fire each time.
Even if one has broken the precepts and damaged the practice,
what one does and creates will still be accomplished.
How much more so for one who is pure, observes the precepts fully, and practices!

original: 又法取犢子瞿摩夷護摩七日。
analyzed: 又法取犢子瞿摩夷護摩七日。
translated: Furthermore, take the urine of a young calf and perform homa for seven days.

original: 每夜一時誦真言一千八遍。
analyzed: 每夜一時誦真言一千八遍。
translated: Each night, recite the mantra one thousand and eight times.

original: 一遍取瞿摩夷少許一擲火中。
analyzed: 一遍取瞿摩夷少許一擲火中。
translated: Each time, take a small amount of urine and throw it into the fire.
One will then obtain one hundred cows.
Furthermore, take khādira wood.
Smear it with ghee, honey, and curds.
Perform homa for three days, three times a day.
Each time, recite the mantra one thousand and eight times.
Recite once and throw it into the fire once.
You will then obtain a treasure trove.
If you make extensive offerings,
the treasure trove will be inexhaustible.
Furthermore, enter a river and stand in the water up to your chest.

original: 取蓮華搵檀香其檀香磨如泥。
analyzed: 取蓮華搵檀香其檀香磨如泥。
translated: Take lotus flowers and soak them in sandalwood. Grind the sandalwood into a paste.
Recite the mantra a hundred thousand times.
Recite once and throw it into the water once.
The treasure trove you obtain will accumulate like lotus flowers.

original: 又法取吉祥木一千八段搵酥。
analyzed: 又法取吉祥木一千八段搵酥。
translated: Furthermore, take one thousand and eight pieces of auspicious wood and soak them in ghee.
Perform homa for three days, three times a day.
Recite the mantra one thousand and eight times each time.
Recite once and throw it into the fire once.
You will then obtain abundant wealth and treasures.

original: 又法取烏油麻稻穀花相和。
analyzed: 又法取烏油麻稻穀花相和。
translated: Furthermore, take black sesame and rice grains and mix them together.

original: 對像前護摩三日日三時。
analyzed: 對像前護摩三日日三時。
translated: Perform homa in front of an image for three days, three times a day.
Recite the mantra one thousand and eight times each time.
Recite once and throw it into the fire once.
You will then obtain inexhaustible food and drink in your home.

original: 又法欲得降伏一切龍者。
analyzed: 又法欲得降伏一切龍者。
translated: Furthermore, if you wish to subdue all dragons,

original: 取種種花護摩三日日三時。
analyzed: 取種種花護摩三日日三時。
translated: Take various flowers and perform homa for three days, three times a day.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times each time,
throwing it into the fire once for each recitation.
You will then subdue all nāgas.
Again, the method for subduing yakṣas:
In front of the image, take bezoar pills,
and perform homa for seven days, three times a day.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times each time,
throwing it into the fire once for each recitation.
You will then subdue all yakṣas.
Again, the method for summoning a yakṣiṇī:

original: 取無憂木准前藥叉護摩法。
analyzed: 取無憂木准前藥叉護摩法。
translated: Take wood from the aśoka tree and perform homa according to the previous method for subduing yakṣas.

original: 即召得藥叉女來恭敬承事。
analyzed: 即召得藥叉女來恭敬承事。
translated: You will then summon the yakṣiṇī to come and respectfully serve you.
Whatever clothes, food and drink,
and various wealth and treasures you need,🔽she will supply them to you as you wish.
Again, in front of the main image,
take agarwood and ghee,
and perform homa for 21 days, three times a day.
Each time, recite the mantra 1,008 times.
Recite the mantra once and throw it into the fire once.

original: 即得一切諸天歡喜助護。
analyzed: 即得一切諸天歡喜助護。
translated: You will then cause all the gods to rejoice and assist in protection.
Disasters and difficulties will be eliminated and blessings and virtues will increase.
Moreover, if you are imprisoned,
bathe at night and put on new clean clothes.
Recite the mantra 1,080 times.
Those who are imprisoned will be immediately released.

original: 又法若被人瞋怒欲相損害者。
analyzed: 又法若被人瞋怒欲相損害者。
